name: part_013
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY1】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE1【チラ見せ】 [IKkSNj5uN6I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Natsuiro Matsuri, Momosuzu Nene, and La+ Darknesss are on stage chatting during the 'hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony' event.
Natsuiro Matsuri performs her self-introduction and interacts with the audience about her 'purity'.
Momosuzu Nene performs her self-introduction with her signature 'Energy Drink' call-and-response.
La+ Darknesss performs her self-introduction with the 'Yes, My Dark' chant.
The three VTubers talk about their upcoming song performances and interact with the crowd.

subtitles.original: すごかったねー！
subtitles.english: That was amazing, wasn't it!

subtitles.original: すごかったよ！
subtitles.english: It was amazing!

subtitles.original: 吾輩の方がすごいけどね。
subtitles.english: I'm even more amazing, though.

subtitles.original: パン、パン、パン、パン！ポケモンパン！フレッシュ！フレッシュ！
subtitles.english: Clap, clap, clap, clap! Pokemon Pan! Fresh! Fresh!

subtitles.original: なんでヲタクに言わせない！？
subtitles.english: Why didn't you let the otaku say it!?

subtitles.original: 吾輩から言う……似合ってるから！
subtitles.english: I'll say it... because it looks good on you!

subtitles.original: もう、ねね疲れちゃった……。
subtitles.english: Geez, Nene's already tired...

subtitles.original: 頑張ったからね。頑張った、頑張った。
subtitles.english: Because you worked hard. You did it, you did it.

subtitles.original: 吾輩が一番好きなのこれ。
subtitles.english: This is my favorite one.

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっと自己紹介しよ！自己紹介。そうだね。
subtitles.english: Ah, let's do self-introductions! Right.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、先輩から！
subtitles.english: Then, starting from our senior!

subtitles.original: はい！じゃあ、みんなオレンジ色見せてくれるかな？
subtitles.english: Okay! Everyone, can you show me some orange?

subtitles.original: すごいな。めっちゃあっちまでオレンジ！
subtitles.english: Amazing. It's orange all the way over there!

subtitles.original: はい、みんな！ホロライブの清楚担当、みんなのアイドル、夏色まつりです！
subtitles.english: Hello everyone! Hololive's 'purity' representative, everyone's idol, Natsuiro Matsuri here!

subtitles.original: ちょっとまつりやりたいことあるんです、ついでにやっていいですか？
subtitles.english: There's something Matsuri wants to do, can I do it while I'm at it?

subtitles.original: 今からまつりが「夏色まつりは清楚だよな？」って聞くんで、清楚だ！と思って反応してください。
subtitles.english: I'm going to ask 'Natsuiro Matsuri is pure, right?' so please respond thinking 'She is pure!'

subtitles.original: 夏色まつりは清楚だよなー！
subtitles.english: Natsuiro Matsuri is pure, right?!

subtitles.original: おい！聞こえてない。聞こえてない質問もあるか……。
subtitles.english: Hey! I can't hear you. Maybe there are some questions I didn't hear...

subtitles.original: 次、ねねち、ねねち！
subtitles.english: Next, Nenechi, Nenechi!

subtitles.original: あの、茶を濁してください。
subtitles.english: Um, please change the subject.

subtitles.original: みんなそのままオレンジで大丈夫い！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, you can stay orange! Yay!

subtitles.original: みんな、ねねが「みんなの心の」って言ったら「エナジードリンク」で返してね。
subtitles.english: Everyone, when Nene says 'Your heart's', please respond with 'Energy Drink'.

subtitles.original: ホロライブ五期生、ねぽらぼの、みんなの心の……
subtitles.english: Hololive 5th Generation, of NePoLaBo, your heart's...

subtitles.original: エナジードリンク！
subtitles.english: Energy Drink!

subtitles.original: 桃鈴ねねです！今日よろしく！
subtitles.english: I'm Momosuzu Nene! Let's have fun today!

subtitles.original: 本当に同じ観客ですかさっきと？
subtitles.english: Is this really the same audience as before?

subtitles.original: うん、同じだよね、みんな。
subtitles.english: Yeah, they're the same, right everyone?

subtitles.original: 全然声量が……
subtitles.english: The volume is totally...

subtitles.original: ねねに優しい！まんまん！
subtitles.english: They're kind to Nene! Perfect!

subtitles.original: ほら、じゃあオレンジじゃないやつ行けよ。
subtitles.english: Look, go for something not orange then.

subtitles.original: じゃあいつもの、いいですか？
subtitles.english: Then, the usual, are you ready?

subtitles.original: 貴様ら！跪け！
subtitles.english: You lot! Kneel!

subtitles.original: Yes, My Dark!
subtitles.english: Yes, My Dark!

subtitles.original: 吾輩のお名前は、ラプラス・ダークネスだ！
subtitles.english: My name is La+ Darknesss!

subtitles.original: すいちゃんから始まって、我々も来ましたけど。
subtitles.english: Starting with Sui-chan, we've arrived as well.

subtitles.original: ちなみに二人は何歌うんですか？ねねち何歌うの？
subtitles.english: By the way, what are you two singing? Nenechi, what are you singing?

subtitles.original: ねねは新しい曲を歌うんだけど……あ、X（Twitter）でポストしたから、
subtitles.english: Nene is going to sing a new song... ah, I posted about it on X,

subtitles.original: みんなさすがに覚えてきてくれたよね？
subtitles.english: so everyone remembered it and came, right?

subtitles.original: 覚えてなかったら処刑だからな。
subtitles.english: If you didn't remember, it's execution.

subtitles.original: だってもね、あ、もうコール完璧だと思うんで。
subtitles.english: Because, well, I think the calls will be perfect.

subtitles.original: みんな完璧だよね？完璧だよね？
subtitles.english: Everyone's perfect, right? Right?

subtitles.original: ほら！最前列の海外ニキがさ、ほら「イェーイ！」って言ってくれてる。
subtitles.english: Look! The overseas fans in the front row, see, they're saying 'Yay!'

subtitles.original: めっちゃ分かりやすい。ねっ子めっちゃ分かりやすい。
subtitles.english: It's so clear. The Nekko (Husbandos) are so easy to spot.

subtitles.original: ねっ子発見！ねっ子発見！抜いてこ、抜いてこ。
subtitles.english: Nekko found! Nekko found! Let's pull them out.

subtitles.original: まつり先輩はどうなんですか？
subtitles.english: How about you, Matsuri-senpai?

subtitles.original: まつりはね……内緒！
subtitles.english: As for Matsuri... it's a secret!

subtitles.original: でもオリジナル曲で、今までにはない感じの曲。
subtitles.english: But it's an original song, and it has a vibe I haven't done before.

subtitles.original: 今日、女まつりすの子も来ていると思うんですけど。
subtitles.english: I think there are female Matsurisu (fans) here today as well.

subtitles.original: その子がちょっと共感できるような感じかな？
subtitles.english: I think it's a song they might be able to relate to.

subtitles.original: 皆さん、なんと吾輩……
subtitles.english: Everyone, amazingly, I...

subtitles.original: この後歌います！
subtitles.english: ...will be singing right after this!

subtitles.original: 知らなかった！リハも見せてくれないし。
subtitles.english: I didn't know! You wouldn't even let us see the rehearsal.
